Tanks

Class Terrain

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.Terrain

  • public class Terrain
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the terrain in the tank game, including the graphical representation, terrain obstacles, and specific locations for trees and tanks. This class manages the loading and rendering of different terrains based on the level.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Terrain

        public Terrain(processing.core.PApplet parent,
               App app)
        Constructs a Terrain object, loads tree images based on the current level.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent PApplet instance for drawing on the canvas.
        app - The main application object for accessing game settings and level information.

    • Method Detail

      • getYc

        public static float getYc(float x)
        Calculates and returns the y-coordinate for a given x-coordinate, interpolating if necessary.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate for which to find the corresponding y-coordinate.
        Returns:
        The interpolated y-coordinate based on the current terrain heights.

      • loadTreeImage

        public void loadTreeImage()
        Loads the tree image based on the current level.

      • loadTerrain

        public void loadTerrain(java.lang.String levelPath)
        Loads and processes terrain data from a file.
        Parameters:
        levelPath - The file path to the terrain data for the level.

      • applyMovingAverage

        public static void applyMovingAverage(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Float> heights)
        Applies a moving average filter to the terrain heights to smooth out the graphical representation.
        Parameters:
        heights - The list of height values for each point on the terrain.

      • displayTerrain

        public void displayTerrain()
        Displays the terrain based on the currently loaded heights and tree positions. Colors and details are adjusted based on the current game level.
